Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VisuCon-F Frozen Coag Screen N and ABN, assayed normal and abnormal control plasmas for quality control of quantitative coagulation assays.
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed normal or abnormal control plasma for use in the quality control of quantitative coagulation assays (PT, APTT, and fibrinogen), in the normal or mid-level abnormal range, used with mechanical and photo-optical coagulation instruments and commercial reagents.
